scripts.build: web-ext build -s src/ && npm run build:clean
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:clean && npm run config:dev  && npm run build
scripts.build:stage: npm run build:clean && npm run config:stage && npm run build
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:clean && npm run config:prod && npm run build
scripts.config:dev: sed -i '' 's/:8000//g'  src/manifest.json src/js/background.js src/popup.html && sed -i '' 's@http://127.0.0.1@https://dev.fxprivaterelay.nonprod.cloudops.mozgcp.net@g' src/manifest.json src/js/background.js src/popup.html
scripts.config:stage: sed -i '' 's/:8000//g'  src/manifest.json src/js/background.js src/popup.html && sed -i '' 's@http://127.0.0.1@https://stage.fxprivaterelay.nonprod.cloudops.mozgcp.net@g' src/manifest.json src/js/background.js src/popup.html
scripts.config:prod: sed -i '' 's/:8000//g'  src/manifest.json src/js/background.js src/popup.html && sed -i '' 's@http://127.0.0.1@https://relay.firefox.com@g' src/manifest.json src/js/background.js src/popup.html
